text: HTdr 7efy TTTHTf wfatrut T Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7 4a7t 73v 4Ra67 3< totATTf FATaT4) Gj44 /Fax 91.11-25093507 25093514 M7 7t  National Highways Authority of India WAJ Extn:: 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) d-5 W 6, 727-10, TRGT, T frh-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No: 11041/218/2007-Admn: 28th November 2007 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL 03 /2007) Decision taken on note of CM Division dated 02.11.2007) Sub Access for permission to Retain Outlets-reg t has been observed that processing of Permission Cases of Retail Outlets is taking unduly long time at PIU level. PDs are directed to process the cases of Retail Outlets and respond to the concerned Oil Company or NHAI HQ as the case may be within 15 days of the receipt of such proposals. Further; PDs are directed to submit monthly report to CM Division/or their respective Technical Division regarding date of receipt of the proposals and also the dates of disposal in the format given below Sr; Name of Oil Location Date of Date Proposals Remarks, No_ Company Receipt dispatchl sent to whom if any disposal (Oil  Company IHQ 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
